author: Linden Skjeie
text:
Can someone do some research to find out what sustainability initiatives have been done in fire departments?  Meaning things like environmental procurement, integrated pest management, water and energy conservation, green fleet, local organic food, green cleaning, etc.  We are embarking on such an initiative in San Jose and I would like to know what's already been done elsewhere.
Thanks,
Linden Skjeie
City of San Jose Environmental Services Department
title: Fire Departments and Sustainability
